org.dataone.nescent
Class mainC

java.lang.Object
  org.dataone.nescent.mainC

public class mainC
extends java.lang.Object

Main class that directs the creation of RDF from the three DataONE data repositories

Author:
Aida Gandara, http://trust.cs.utep.edu/members/aida/foaf.rdf

Method Summary
static void getDataONEData(boolean doit)
          handles getting the Dryad data: sets up the datasets that will be translated to RDF, performs the translation to RDF then publishes the RDF to my research server

static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
          sets up server information then makes calls to generate and publish RDF from the three DataONE repositories
static void uploadFOAFFile(boolean doit)
          uploads a sample foaf file made for various authors found in the sample data filename: samplefoaf
